title: 求救。依家係羅馬唔見護照。可以點做

我試左打中國駐意大利使館
003068413458
冇人聽！

我依家執多次個酒店
我好怕係咪未揾到

去報失？
我聽日中午機。。。
一好怕

我試左打中國駐意大利使館
003068413458
冇人聽！


Is this the right telephone number?

http://it.chineseembassy.org/chn/lsyw/shilingguanjieshao/t510590.htm

The Chinese Consulate in Rome also has a mobile phone number -

领保应急手机：0039-3939110852

The Chinese Consulate in Rome will open at 0930 hours tomorrow (Monday) morning. What time is your flight?

You will need to apply for a Chinese Travel Document in order to return to Hong Kong. Please see link below for details -

http://it.chineseembassy.org/chn/lsyw/huzhaolvxingzheng/t806243.htm

You will need -

1) a completed application form
2) 3 passport photos of yourself with a white or light blue background
3) 55 Euros in fees
4) a photocopy of your HK ID card
係咪間酒店or hostel收走左喳

你要打左去hk入境處， 講左先， 佢先會發文件過去領事館， 俾你安排補領， 帶埋報警紙

呢個係我日本唔見護照經驗

剛剛 google到個電話
香港入境事務處「協助在外香港居民小組」24小時求助熱線：(852) 1868

Do you have British National (Overseas) status and have an expired BN(O) passport for less than 10 years?

If you do, you can try and apply for a British Emergency Travel Document.

Details -

Emergency consular assistance (24 hours) +39 06 4220 0001

The Rome Consular Section is open Monday to Friday 9am to 12pm and 2pm to 3pm

https://www.gov.uk/emergency-travel-document/how-to-apply

You will need to make an appointment with the consulate.
